title: Stunning 2-Bedroom Apartment Home, Right By The River!
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 978 Sq.
The Merc is the best place to live in the city.
We have lovely studio, one and two bedroom apartments in Bothell, WA for rent that we know you’ll love.
You will be delighted at the fully equipped kitchen, energy efficient appliances, and creative design including windows that provide great lighting in all of our apartments.
As a resident, you’ll enjoy our parcel pending package lockers, bike storage, rooftop lounge, and rooftop deck with a breathtaking view of Bothell.
We are also a pet-friendly community, so your furry friends are welcome.
Our prime location is minutes away from seventeen Brew Pubs in the Bothell/Woodinville/Kenmore triangle.
We are in walking distance of fantastic shopping, entertainment, and dining spots.
Visit us and take a tour of our Bothell apartments today!

• Walk-In Closets (Most Homes), • Well-equipped Entertaining Kitchens, • Quartz Counter Tops, • Large Windows in Every Home, • Double Pane Windows, • Oversize Private Balconies (Select Units), • Breathtaking Views, • Full Size Washer and Dryer in Every Home!, • Beautiful Stainless Steel Appliances, • Built In A/C (Loft Homes), • Vaulted Ceiling (Loft Homes), • A/C Hookup Ports (Most Homes), • Professionally Designed Colors and Finishes

• Complimentary Bike Storage, • Yoga Studio with Virtual Fitness Classes, • Controlled Access Community and Residential Only Parking Garage, • Onsite Storage Units, • 24 Hour Parcel Pending Package Lockers, • Largest Rooftop Deck with BBQ Grills, Fire Pits, and Amazing Sunset Views, • 24 Hour Fitness Center with Live TV, •Minutes to the Famous Burke Gilman Trail, Perfect for Walking and Biking, • Elegant Lobby, • Bike Wash and Tune Up Station, • State of the Art Coffee Machine and Snack Bar, • Resident Rooftop Lounge with Pool Table and Kitchen
